resources.string: New Version %1$s was found. Do you need to download it?
File downloaded successfully. Did you upgrade?
Checking in, please wait a moment....
The upgrade package has been downloaded. Did you upgrade?
Upgrade file is available locally. Do you want to upgrade?
There are multiple USB devices, please make sure the device only has one USB
File detected successfully. Is it upgraded?
The file is not upgradable. Please download again ÔºÅ
Unable to connect to the server,please check your network or server
Download failed, server connection not found!
There is not enough local storage. Will you delete the local update.zip file?
Connect timeout! Please check the network
The server ID is different from the local ID
Please do not power off, disconnect or leave the interface, otherwise the OTA upgrade will fail
Unable to connect to the server,please check your network or server
Do you want to cancel the file download?
Please do not click too quickly!
Please switch to administrator account first
You can check progress or install package in Settings: About the Device -> Firmware Version Update
Network is slow or abnormal,reconnecting, please wait...
Background download failed, please download again
System upgrading, do not power off or exit this interface!
The system upgrade is successful! The system will be imported and used after restart. Do you want to restart now?
The system upgrade failed, please restart to upgrade again!
Failed to start the upgrade service!
Do not upgrade again! It is detected that the upgrade process has been triggered this time, please restart to check the result.
